functions.tag: {pages:["{\"text\": \"\\n\\n       A Guide to\\n        The Void\\n\\n\\n\\n        ///////\"}", "{\"text\": \"Preface\\n    Since I started doing this magic, strage things have happened to me. Visions, bad omens. Nothing is real and everything seems like a dream. I've since decided to record my experiences with these magics, as a warning to any who might dare to obtain\"}", "{\"text\": \"the power of the Void.\\n     It is my hope that my experiences will deter the young and foolish from the same fate that I posess. Alas, if you've made it this far, you might as well keep reading. \\n\\n\\n                - A\"}", "{\"text\": \"Sacrifical Dagger\\n    Its a simple tool, yet has many magical properties. By melting zombie flesh onto my iron sword, I was able to capture parts of animal souls in empty bottles. Strangely, this only happens with this weapon.\"}", "{\"text\": \"Cauldrons\\n    The iron basin known as the cauldron is a lot more useful that I previously thought. When heated from underneath and filled to the brim with water, I am able to combine the Soul Fragments with a diamond and glowstone dust to create a strange gem. These\"}", "{\"text\": \"gems, which I shall call Soul Gems, have varying levels of power that can capture the complete soul of more difficult mobs with each diamond used to create them.\"}"],title:"The Void, Vol.1",author:Unknown}
